title: History of man: how man discovers his past
creator_credit: McGraw-Hill Films, American Broadcasting Company and Gene Feldman
brief_description: Portrays the ways in which history is reconstructed by anthropologists, archaeologists, historians and others who investigate the past. Presents history as a process of reinterpretation, always subject to new evidence. Suitable for upper secondary level.
